dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, big news this week, uh, from the University of Oxford and AstraZeneca, right? Their COVID-19 vaccine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, big news this week, uh, from the University of Oxford and AstraZeneca, right? Their C O V I D-nineteen vaccine.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, huge! Early findings from their Phase 2 trials, published in The Lancet, show it's safe and, um, generates a really robust immune response in older adults.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, huge! Early findings from their Phase two trials, published in The Lancet, show it's safe and, um, generates a really robust immune response in older adults.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Covid-19 vaccine being developed by the University of Oxford and AstraZeneca is safe and able to generate a robust immune response in older adults, according to early findings from Phase 2 clinical trials published in medical journal The Lancet Wednesday...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Which is, like, so important because, typically, older adults just don't respond as well to vaccines, do they? Their immune systems are, you know, a bit weaker.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is, like, so important because, typically, older adults just don't respond as well to vaccines, do they? Their immune systems are, you know, a bit weaker.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Typically, older adults respond less well to vaccines as the immune system gradually deteriorates with age, says lead author Professor Andrew Pollard.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And Professor Andrew Pollard, the lead author, he highlighted that. But these trials, uh, found a *similar* immune response across all ages, which is pretty wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And Professor Andrew Pollard, the lead author, he highlighted that. But these trials, uh, found a similar immune response across all ages, which is pretty wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The results from a Phase 2 clinical trial studying the response of the vaccine in 560 adults... found a similar immune response in all ages studied.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Wow, that's incredible! So, even the 70-plus group saw a strong response?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's incredible! So, even the seventy-plus group saw a strong response?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The results from a Phase 2 clinical trial studying the response of the vaccine in 560 adults, including 240 over the age of 70 found a similar immune response in all ages studied.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And get this: the adverse reactions – like injection site pain, headache, fatigue – they were described as mild, and actually *less* common in older adults.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And get this: the adverse reactions - like injection site pain, headache, fatigue - they were described as mild, and actually less common in older adults.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The adverse reactions to the vaccine which researchers described as mild, including injection site pain, headache and fatigue were also less common in older adults.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Less common? That's, that's amazing. I mean, usually you'd expect, uh, more, or at least the same.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Less common? That's, that's amazing. I mean, usually you'd expect, uh, more, or at least the same.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? So, it's not just effective in that group, it's also, um, well-tolerated. Dr. Maheshi Ramasamy, a co-author, said it's really encouraging for the vulnerable.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? So, it's not just effective in that group, it's also, um, well-tolerated. Doctor Maheshi Ramasamy, a co-author, said it's really encouraging for the vulnerable.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Dr Maheshi Ramasamy, a co-author of the study, said the robust immune responses seen in older people are encouraging.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's all about protecting those at highest risk, isn't it? Though, um, Phase 3 trials are still underway to confirm the full effectiveness.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's all about protecting those at highest risk, isn't it? Though, um, Phase three trials are still underway to confirm the full effectiveness.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While further research will be needed to determine whether the vaccine is effective Phase 3 trials are already underway to do this...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. But this just adds to the overall optimism, doesn't it? I mean, we've had Pfizer and Moderna with their incredible late-stage results.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. But this just adds to the overall optimism, doesn't it? I mean, we've had Pfizer and Moderna with their incredible late-stage results.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the optimism generated by the preliminary findings will be buoyed by the onrush of hope stemming from the vaccine successes of Pfizer and Modernas late stage clinical trials announced this week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely! Pfizer, like, 95% effective. Moderna with similar findings. It just feels like, um, a wave of really good news.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely! Pfizer, like, ninety five percent effective. Moderna with similar findings. It just feels like, um, a wave of really good news.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pfizer, in conjunction with BioNTech, have completed Phase 3 trials, finding their vaccine to be 95% effective at preventing disease. ... Moderna announced similar findings Monday, though the trial is ongoing and that number liable to change.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really does. After 55 million global cases, you know, we really, really need this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really does. After fifty five million global cases, you know, we really, really need this.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With global Covid-19 cases now beyond the grim milestone of 55 million, the news of safe and reliable vaccines are welcome...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: We do. So, while not conclusive yet, these early findings are, like, super hopeful.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: We do. So, while not conclusive yet, these early findings are, like, super hopeful.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While these findings are not conclusive, coming from early stage clinical trials, the optimism generated by the preliminary findings will be buoyed by the onrush of hope...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. A real beacon of hope, I think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. A real beacon of hope, I think.
